nodes.title: Use a custom AsyncTask from Google using a two thread executor.
Switch from Google Analytics to Google Analytics for Firebase
Support sharing new TVDB URLs to add show
Fix for issue #520 - Local search only works with exact title
Use Room transactions in Content Provider
Endless scrolling for popular shows (Paging library)
Potential fix for JobIntentService SecurityException de-queuing work
Drop default language setting, default to English
Get full episode details again when adding/updating show.
Replace textIsSelectable="true" with long-click to copy to clipboard EVERYWHERE
Replace textIsSelectable="true" with long-click to copy to clipboard
Lint: print text report to sdtout (for CI as reports are not public).
[EpisodeDetailsActivity] Fixed current season not being restored properly
Comply with official App shortcuts icon design guidelines
Add option to sort shows by their network
Use a more poster friendly shortcut icon size
Limiting handleHourPastMidnight to U.S. shows only
Fixing possible NPEs when CheckInDialogFragment.newInstance returns null
Watchlist and Collection of movies from TMDb, syncable with trakt
Release time calculation supports countries, hour past midnight anomaly
Save trakt password inside Android Account
Move v17 layouts to ldrtl qualified directory
Use okhttp to create url connections.
Fix for + button not disappearing after adding show
Move episode search and home screen shortcuts to activity: #311
Clean up: These should all be static
Fix styling issues when using the DarkActionBar.
Add the ability to share the TV poster/episode image when viewing them in fullscreen mode
Theme the fast scroll thumb in relation to the current theme
Remove the ActionBar overlay in the EpisodeDetailsActivity.
Change the width of the TabPageIndicator, in the MoviesActivity, to `match_parent`
Make TV show posters and episode previews viewable in fullscreen.
Add the ability to pin TV shows to the Homescreen
Add the option to search for a movie on Google Play
This change opens Google Play links directly to the Movies & TV category
This change checks for Trakt credentials before rating a show.
Only add the MenuDrawer content once.
This change ensures any requested MenuItems are adjusted correctly in
This change adds StrictMode support and makes several formatting changes
Make the title and description selectable when adding new shows.
Add language support to Tmdb query
Add instructions for removing a show.
Add app widget system theme, support Android 12 system theme
Add watched toggle to app widget
Window color app bar, regular case type
Switch to Firebase Auth for email sign-in on non-Google devices
Statistics for shows I've finished watching
Remove TheTVDB from the contributing guide
Check if google-services.json file is present before making any calls to Firebase Crashlytics
Use TMDB as source for shows
Auto IDs for shows, seasons, episodes
Detect locked Trakt accounts during sign-in
Use Countly to report some network request errors.
ButterKnife: try if using R2 shuts up lint warning (no, it doesn't).
Compile with and target Android SDK 29 (Q)
Follow-up: also print title of show/movie that failed to update.
Truncate Storage Access Framework file before writing backup to it.
Show last show or movie error if syncing fails
Create auto backups that can be backed up by Android
Add option to only notify about episodes to watch next.
Switch to DayNight theme, update to material 1.1.0
Add confirmation dialog for set watched up to
Support image URLs with legacy cache path
Use new artworks.thetvdb.com base for images
Show search: drop any language, use TheTVDB for English
Calendar: filter for only premieres (first episodes)
OverviewFragment: add empty view, suggest to look for similar shows.
Migrate Amazon extension and list widget preferences to AndroidX
Use close icon instead of up arrow if not always going up
AddShowDialogFragment: add stream search button (if configured and turned on).
Allow to upgrade to new subscription tears (and downgrade later)
Migrate to official Play Billing Library
Support upcoming state for shows, include in backups.
Darker overlay status and action bar
Report service errors with stack trace at error call site
Support setting movies watched locally and with Cloud
Move show filter and sort order settings to own dialog
Show list: replace favorite with set watched button
Change minimum supported Android version to 5 (L, 21)
Switch away from Google Sign-In API marked as SDK only
Update privacy policy for Google Analytics for Firebase
